segments.text: Susan , I am inviting you and Frank to our house warming party this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Deborah and I are going to buy a new home in Woodlawn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! That ’ s wonderful . I bet both of you are quite happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have always dreamed of owning our own home , but real estate 1 in this area is extremely expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . That ’ s why Christopher and I want to find a place in a small town , far from the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea if you can find employment nearby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . That ’ s why Christopher is already looking for a job in Maine , or Wisconsin .
segments.speaker: S2
